General.Name: Inland ZDP Plc
General.Description: Inland ZDP Plc issues zero dividend preference shares (ZDP). It lends the proceeds received from the ZDP share issues to Inland Homes 2013 Limited. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Beaconsfield, the United Kingdom. Inland ZDP Plc operates as a subsidiary of Inland Homes 2013 Limited.
General.Address: Burnham Yard, Beaconsfield, United Kingdom, HP9 2JH
